channel.title: Comments for page "CollecCRANK>=1%%@# SYNTAX ERROR"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "CollecCRANK>=1%%@# SYNTAX ERROR"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: then the info on this page needs to be changed to correctly describe it. currently it says you need crank to get the mission, not to get the hidden reward.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
You must have the crank set at 1+ to get a chance to get this drop as hinted in the title of this mission.

You can get this mission without any crank, but you need a crank to get the errant bit.
People were using the power of greass with no crank, and they never got the drop.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Are we sure that we need crank 1+ to get the mission? I just got it four times w/o any crank, or do we need crank 1+ to get the item on the mission?
